name: So Peaceful
content: You know that in this world
The right now nothing can hurt you
So simple in front of people
So peaceful inside then I say
So peaceful inside then I say
So peaceful inside then I say
So peaceful inside then I say
You feel it on your arms
So let your soul be in peace
So peaceful inside then I say
So peaceful inside then I say
So peaceful inside then I say
So peaceful inside then I say
I feel so peaceful feel so peaceful
I feel so peaceful feel so peaceful
